item.description:
4th of July Fireworks over Gloucester Harbor
America's Oldest Sea Port & Art Colony
Cape Ann, Massachusetts

Cape Ann Celebrates Independence Day with Fireworks, Parades, Bonfires, Concerts, and more.

July 3, 2009

6:00 p.m. - Gloucester Horribles Parade

9:30 p.m. - Grand Fireworks Display over Gloucester Harbor

The parade starts at 6:00, it's probably best to meet at the Friendly's rotary and then park at the Walgreen's on Rogers St. parking lot and watch the parade from there best to bring a lawn chair so you can relax and watch the fireworks. The parade lasts an hour or so. Then we can go to a local restaurant for a bite to eat and then walk (or drive) to see the fireworks at 9:30.

If you are not able to meet early for the parade, but want to come to the fireworks, email me Janet or I and we will email you our cell phone #'s.

Hope to see you there!!!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be outside of Friendly's on the rotary.
item.name: Let's go to Gloucester for a Parade and Fireworks!!
